bike.description: Specialized FACT 7r carbon, triple monocoque construction, compact race design, Zertz inserts

components.description: Specialized FACT carbon, monocoque construction, OS race for 1-3/8" bearing, full carbon legs, crown and steerer w/ Zertz inserts.
Specialized Campy style, 1-3/8" lower bearing, integrated threadless, sealed cartridge bearings, 20mm alloy cone w/ one 10mm and two 5mm alloy spacers

Specialized Pro, 2014 alloy, short-drop, ergonomic shaping, 31.8mm
Body Geometry Bar Phat, cork ribbon w/ 4mm gel padding
